meta.title: Lists
filterPane.title: Filter
mainPane.title: Lists
mainPane.subTitle: {count, plural, =0 {No records found} =1 {1 record found} other {# records found}}
create-list.subtitle: Set criteria to build query
create-list.title: New list
warning.inactive-status: Warning: making status inactive will clear list contents.
list.modal.confirm-message: Are you sure you want to delete the list {listName}?
callout.list.refresh.error: The list {listName} was not refreshed. Please try again.
callout.list.save.error.version: Error: {listName} was updated by another user. Please refresh the page.
callout.list.csv-export.begin: Export of {listName} is being generated. This may take some time for larger lists.
callout.list.csv-export.success: List {listName} was successfully exported to CSV.
callout.list.csv-export.cancel: The export for {listName} was successfully cancelled
callout.list.csv-export.cancel-error: Error: the export for {listName} was not cancelled. Verify a export is in progress and try again.
callout.list.active: {listName} is active. Refresh {listName} to see list contents
lists.edit.title: Edit {listName}
delete-list.refresh.in.progress: Error: {listName} was not deleted. Lists can't be deleted while a refresh is in progress.
delete-export.in.progress: Error: {listName} was not deleted. Lists can't be deleted while an export is in progress.
delete-list.not.found: Error: {listName} was not deleted because the list was not found. Verify the list location and try again.
update-list.refresh.in.progress: Error: changes to {listName} were not saved. Lists can't be updated while a refresh is in progress.
update-export.in.progress: Error: changes to {listName} were not saved. Lists can't be updated while an export is in progress.
update-list.not.found: Error: changes to {listName} were not saved because the list was not found. Verify the list location and try again.
update-optimistic.lock.exception: Error: someone else modified {listName}. Reload the page to view the latest version of this list.
refresh-list.is.inactive: Error: {listName} was not refreshed because it is inactive. Set the list status to active to refresh the list.
refresh-list.refresh.in.progress: Error: refresh for {listName} failed because a refresh for this list is already in progress.
refresh-export.in.progress: Error: {listName} was not refreshed. Lists can't be refreshed while an export is in progress.
refresh-list.not.found: Error: {listName} was not refreshed because the list was not found. Verify the list location and try again.
refresh-max.list.size.exceeded: Error: refresh for {listName} failed because the refreshed list contains too many records.
refresh-list.missing.query: Error: {listName} was not refreshed. Add a query before refreshing the list.
export-list.refresh.in.progress: Error: {listName} was not exported. Lists can't be exported while a refresh is in progress.
export-export.in.progress: Error: export of {listName} failed because an export for this list is already in progress.
export-list.not.found: Error: export of {listName} failed because the list was not found. Verify the list location and try again.
cancel_export-export.not.in.progress: Error: the export for {listName} was not cancelled as the export is not in progress. The export may have already completed.
cancel-refresh.success: The refresh for {listName} was successfully cancelled.
cancel-refresh.default: Error: the refresh for {listName} was not cancelled. Verify a refresh is in progress and try again.
cancel_refresh-list.not.refreshing: Error: the refresh for {listName} was not cancelled. Verify a refresh is in progress and try again.
read-list.not.found: Error: {listName} was not found. Verify the list location and try again.
read-list.is.private: Error: changes to {listName} were not saved. Someone else modified this list and you no longer have access to it.
export-list.is.inactive: Error: export of {listName} failed. Verify the list is active and try to export the list again.
refresh-list.is.private: Error: refresh of {listName} failed. Someone else modified this list and you no longer have access to it.
export-list.is.private: Error: export of {listName} failed. Someone else modified this list and you no longer have access to it.
delete-list.is.private: Error: the list {listName} was not deleted. Someone else modified this list and you no longer have access to it
error-component.read-list.is.private: You don't have permission to view this list
callout.list.created: List {listName} was created. Reload to see changes. Note: the list may not appear based on filters.
callout.list.multiple-created: New lists were created. Reload to see changes. Note: new lists may not appear based on filters.
create-list.main.list-visibility.tooltip: Shared lists can be accessed by all users with permissions to the Lists app in this organization. Private lists can only be accessed by the user logged in.
create-list.main.list-status.tooltip: Active lists consist of a query and resulting record set. Inactive lists can have a query, but no record set.
lists.copy.title: Liste kopieren: {listName}
error-component.read-entity.type.restric: Sie haben keine Berechtigung, diese Liste zu sehen
commands-error.permission: Benutzer hat keine Berechtigung, diese Aktion durchzuführen
cross-tenant-message: Diese Liste kann Datensätze von mehreren Tenants enthalten.
create-list.cross-tenant-tip: Listen mit mandantenübergreifenden Abfragen können nur auf Privat gesetzt werden.
unexpected.error: Aktion kann nicht abgeschlossen werden. Die Abfrage ist aufgrund eines gelöschten Feldes bzw. gelöschter Felder nicht mehr gültig. Bitte bearbeiten Sie die Abfrage oder löschen Sie die Liste.
update-fql.query.invalid: Aktion kann nicht abgeschlossen werden. Die Abfrage ist aufgrund eines gelöschten Feldes bzw. gelöschter Felder nicht mehr gültig. Bitte bearbeiten Sie die Abfrage oder löschen Sie die Liste.
create-fql.query.invalid: Aktion kann nicht abgeschlossen werden. Die Abfrage ist aufgrund eines gelöschten Feldes bzw. gelöschter Felder nicht mehr gültig. Bitte bearbeiten Sie die Abfrage oder löschen Sie die Liste.
delete-entity.not.found: Error: {listName} was not deleted because the list's entity type is no longer available. Verify the entity type exists and try again.
update-entity.not.found: Error: changes to {listName} were not saved because the list's entity type is no longer available. Verify the entity type exists and try again.
refresh-entity.not.found: Error: {listName} was not refreshed because the list's entity type is no longer available. Verify the entity type exists and try again.
export-entity.not.found: Error: export of {listName} failed because the list's entity type is no longer available. Verify the entity type exists and try again.
read-entity.not.found: Error: {listName}'s entity type was not found. Verify the entity type exists and try again.
error-component.read-entity.not.found: This list's entity type is no longer available
catastrophic-error.missing-all-entity-ty: Sie haben nicht die erforderlichen Berechtigungen, um die Lists-App zu nutzen
catastrophic-error.entity.type.source.mi: A broken record type is preventing access to the Lists app

Custom record type “{parentEntityTypeName}” ({parentEntityTypeId}) references source “{sourceEntityTypeAlias}” ({sourceEntityTypeId}) which could not be found. The Lists app will not be usable until the source is restored, the source is removed from the definition, or the record type is deleted.
catastrophic-error.fallback.heading: An error is preventing access to the Lists app
